title: Trouble logging in
body: Yesterday I was playing for a long time, and decided to take a break after a few hours. When I went to login later that day, I typed my login stuff in and click login and it just shows "Authenticating...". If it doesn't show "Authenticating..." it tells me, "an unexpected error has occurred while logging in. Please try again." and gives me the riot support link. I've went through the connection guide. Some guide dealing with Internet Explorer. I even uninstalled, restarted my computer, and reinstalled it. Nothing is working. Can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Since your patcher is throwing an unexpected error before you even login, this may be an issue where your pc is blocking the patcher entirely. If your pc doesn't have all the right permissions set up, it can sometimes stop the patcher from connecting to our servers at all, which would cause you to see this error. Check out our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to see if we can get that patcher working correctly.

Let me know if you have any questions!
Nothing is really helping. I submitted a ticket as well. I have no clue what the problem is or what it could be.

Since you've already submitted a ticket, I'll leave the rest to them! 

You're in good hands with our specialists, and they'll answer your ticket as soon as they can ^_^!

Would the permissions randomly get changed like that? I came across this problem after I had just recently logged out and attempted to log back into League. I will check out the guide and let you know!
